name: Tremblay Kinfolk Overdrive
description:
If you can, please download a native build of the game. The web version is just offered as a fallback, and it has numerous issues. Controller input doesn't work, and fullscreen scales weird. Sorry!

This game is a nod of appreciation to both the vaporwave genre, and to the sorts of animated sitcoms that became popular in the 1990s. Specifically, the Simpsons, but it's not the only work referenced here.

A note about the visual style: The game does not follow NES specifications exactly. The resolution is right, and the palette is close, but sprites-per-screen limits are not observed. I made some effort to follow the 3-colors-per-sprite rule, and I used traditional cheating methods when assembling larger pictures out of multiple sprites, but I broke it in a few places.

Controls (keyboard)
  • Move with WASD or ARROW KEYS.
  • Attack with J or NUMPAD PLUS. This also advances dialogue.
  • Interact with K or NUMPAD MINUS. This also advances dialogue.
Controls (gamepad)
  • Move with the D-PAD or the LEFT ANALOG STICK.
  • Attack with B or the RED BUTTON. This also advances dialogue.
  • Interact with A or the GREEN BUTTON. This also advances dialogue.
Cool stuff used from elsewhere

This project is chock full of public domain or CC-licensed assets made by other, more talented people:

  • Various tracks by Anonymous 420, including Bitcoin Day, Summer, startup nation and @hotline.gov
  • RottenMage SpaceJacked OST JINGLE 01 by sawsquarenoise
  • Audience reactions by lonemonk and by Free Stock Music
  • studio audience awwww sound FX by Ryan Lloyd
  • 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) by SubspaceAudio
  • City Mega Pack and Today Land Retired Characters by GrafxKid
  • (12x12) City Tiles - Top Down by FisherG
  • Isaiah's Pixel Pack
  • GlasstownNBP Font
  • Nokia Cellphone FC à € by Zeh Fernando
  • Glitch effect Shader by arlez80
  • VHS and CRT monitor effect by pend00
  • 2D wind sway by godotshaders
  • Earthbound-like battle background shader w/scroll effect and palette cycling by r3tr0_dev
